data.persona: I am the Priest of a wealthy parish, my congregation tithes generously. My ornate robes indicate that I defy at least several of the Seven Deadly Sins. Parishioners of my congregation consult with me before entering into new business ventures.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The stained glass glistens in the sun. The pews are lines perfectly.
There's a Candle, a pew, and a stained glass here.
The clergyman and the petitioner are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe and a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the petitioner
data.mid_motivation: I want to convince the petitioner to side with my congregation
data.long_motivation: I want my congregation to be strong and without distraction

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give welcome to petitioner as new member of our church

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go gathering room to give mass
